name: Vegan Pumpkin Mac and Cheese Bake
description: Vegan Pumpkin Mac and Cheese Bake. Easy Creamy Pumpkin Sauce with pasta, topped with crisp sage and breadcrumbs. Vegan Soyfree Recipe Nutfree option

video.name: PUMPKIN MAC & CHEESE BAKE - Pumpkin Or Butternut Cheesy Sauce | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Vegan Pumpkin or Butternut Mac and Cheese Bake. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/10/vegan-pumpkin-mac-and-cheese-bake.html
MY BOOKS: https://veganricha.com/mybooks

This Pumpkin Mac Bake is all things fall! Some sage is crisped with olive oil. The cheese sauce is pumpkin or butternut squash puree + sage + creamy and cheesy components all blended up. Cooked pasta is tossed with the luscious sauce then topped with breadcrumbs and more sage. Bake to golden and done!

This mac and cheese incorporates components from my popular Pumpkin Sage pasta. Its Easy, takes just 15 mins to put together and is flexible to your flavor and texture preference. Can be made without nuts.

recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped onion or shallots
3/4 cup pumpkin puree (or use butternut puree for variation)
1 3/4 cup non dairy milk (such as almond, soy or cashew milk for creamier sauce)
1 tbsp starch (such as corn or arrowroot, or use flour)
2 to 4 tbsp nutritional yeast (for cheesiness. ( Easily omitted, or use 1 tsp miso for similar flavor))
1 to 2 tsp mustard ((natural stoneground), less or more to preference, if using ground, use 1/2 tsp and add 1 tsp lemon juice)
additional flavors (- dashes of cinnamon, smoked paprika, add tomato paste, some vegan cheddar)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instruction on package, rinse in cold water and set aside. Preheat the oven to 400 F (205 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instruction on package, rinse in cold water and set aside. Preheat the oven to 400 F (205 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 tsp oil in a baking dish. Sprinkle the onion, garlic, a third of the sage and pepper flakes and a pinch of salt. Bake for 6 to 8 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 tsp oil in a baking dish. Sprinkle the onion, garlic, a third of the sage and pepper flakes and a pinch of salt. Bake for 6 to 8 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend the sauce ingredients until smooth. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend the sauce ingredients until smooth. Taste and adjust salt and flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooked pasta to the baking dish. Add the sauce and toss well. Add some sage and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooked pasta to the baking dish. Add the sauce and toss well. Add some sage and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining sage, salt and olive oil in a small bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the breadcrumbs with the remaining sage, salt and olive oil in a small bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the breadcrumb topping on the pasta. Bake for 20 to 25 mins. Broil for a minute. Let it sit for a few mins before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the breadcrumb topping on the pasta. Bake for 20 to 25 mins. Broil for a minute. Let it sit for a few mins before serving.

recipeInstructions.text: To freeze: Bake the mac with half the breadcrumb topping for 20 mins, cool completely and freeze the container. Use foil to seal the top surface of the mac and cheese to avoid freezer burn, or transfer portions to containers whih fit the mac with the least air space on top.To reheat: Thaw overnight, add breadcrumb topping and bake for 15 mins or so until heated through and golden on top.
